I feel like: The worst star wars film i have ever seen. it is quite astonishing at how badly written and ill-thought out everything in this film is. i walked out of the cinema half way through this film\, during the excruciatingly bad and pointless casino planet scenes. The previous part of the film was dull and nonsensical with ludicrous character motivations. i recently watched the film all the way through and it does not get better. this film has absolutely killed my love of the saga.
